Key Match Events: Algeria and Angola's tense AFCON opener has ended 1-1 in Bouaké. The point sees both sides move top in Group D with Mauritania and Burkina Faso yet to play.
Pre-Game Insights: In the last match of the day at AFCON, Group D favourites Algeria kick off their campaign with a tricky match against Angola.
Post-Match Reflections: Algeria and Angola’s tense AFCON opener has ended 1-1 in Bouaké. The point sees both sides move top in Group D with Mauritania and Burkina Faso yet to play.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Atalanta have battered Frosinone 5-0 and moved into Serie A’s top five with the thumping win.
Jordan have gotten their Asian Cup campaign off to a flying start, smashing Malaysia 4-0.
Others: The Africa Cup of Nations’ Group C gets underway today with heavyweights Senegal and Cameroon both in action.
South Korea have beaten Bahrain 3-1 in their Asian Cup opener.
Senegal have cruised to a 3-0 win over 10-man Gambia in their opening match at AFCON.
